org.apache.poi.hssf.eventusermodel

Class HSSFRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.hssf.eventusermodel.HSSFRequest

  • public class HSSFRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    An HSSFRequest object should be constructed registering an instance or multiple instances of HSSFListener with each Record.sid you wish to listen for.(HSSFResource对象应构造为将HSSFSYS的一个或多个实例注册到您想要监听的每个Record.sid中。)
    See Also:
    HSSFEventFactory, HSSFListener, HSSFUserException

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HSSFRequest()
      Creates a new instance of HSSFRequest(创建HSSFResource的新实例)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(HSSFListener lsnr, short sid)
      add an event listener for a particular record type.(为特定记录类型添加事件监听器。)
      void addListenerForAllRecords(HSSFListener lsnr)
      This is the equivalent of calling addListener(myListener, sid) for EVERY record in the org.apache.poi.hssf.record package.(这相当于为org.apache.poi.hssf.Record包中的每个记录调用addSYS（mySYS，sid）。)
      protected short processRecord(Record rec)
      Called by HSSFEventFactory, passes the Record to each listener associated with a record.sid.(由HSSFEventFactory调用，将记录传递给与记录关联的每个侦听器。)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • HSSFRequest

        Creates a new instance of HSSFRequest(创建HSSFResource的新实例)

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(HSSFListener lsnr,
                        short sid)
        add an event listener for a particular record type. The trick is you have to know what the records are for or just start with our examples and build on them. Alternatively, you CAN call addListenerForAllRecords and you'll receive ALL record events in one listener, but if you like to squeeze every last byte of efficiency out of life you my not like this. (its sure as heck what I plan to do)(为特定记录类型添加事件监听器。技巧是您必须知道这些记录的用途，或者只需从我们的示例开始并在它们的基础上构建。或者，您可以调用addListenerForAllRecords，您将在一个监听器中接收所有记录事件，但如果您想从生活中榨取最后一个字节的效率，那么您就不喜欢这样了。(its当然我计划做什么）)
        Parameters:
        lsnr - for the event(letts-为活动)
        sid - identifier for the record type this is the .sid static member on the individual records for example req.addListener(myListener, BOFRecord.sid)(sid -记录类型的标识符，这是单个记录上的.sid静态成员，例如req. addrecord（myrecord，BOFRecord.sid）)
        See Also:
        addListenerForAllRecords(HSSFListener)

      • addListenerForAllRecords

        public void addListenerForAllRecords(HSSFListener lsnr)
        This is the equivalent of calling addListener(myListener, sid) for EVERY record in the org.apache.poi.hssf.record package. This is for lazy people like me. You can call this more than once with more than one listener, but that seems like a bad thing to do from a practice-perspective unless you have a compelling reason to do so (like maybe you send the event two places or log it or something?).(这相当于为org.apache.poi.hssf.Record包中的每个记录调用addSYS（mySYS，sid）。这是为像我这样的懒惰人准备的。你可以在不止一个听众面前多次呼叫这个问题，但从实践的角度来看，这似乎是一件坏事，除非你有令人信服的理由这样做（比如你可能会将事件发送到两个地方或记录它或其他什么？）。)
        Parameters:
        lsnr - a single listener to associate with ALL records(lSYS-与所有记录关联的单个监听器)

      • processRecord

        protected short processRecord(Record rec)
                       throws HSSFUserException
        Called by HSSFEventFactory, passes the Record to each listener associated with a record.sid.(由HSSFEventFactory调用，将记录传递给与记录关联的每个侦听器。)
        Parameters:
        rec - the record to be processed(rec -要处理的记录)
        Returns:
        numeric user-specified result code. If zero continue processing.(数字用户指定的结果代码。如果为零，继续处理。)
        Throws:
        HSSFUserException - User exception condition(HSSFUserResponse-用户异常条件)
